channel.title: My Happiness Stack - NKG
channel.description: Recent content on My Happiness Stack - NKG

item.title: Why I Do Not Drink or Smoke
item.description: This post is more about my story, not as much of the reasons why you shouldn’t use any substances. I wrote this as a way to finally show this side of my life, not as a guide to what you should be doing with yours. Backstory Young Age Alcoholism in the family was just one of those things that I thought every kid dealt with. Alcohol was an “adult beverage”.

item.title: About
item.description: Welcome to my blog site Hello and welcome! I am NKG, the autor of this site. I created this blog in an effort to not only find happiness for myself, but also spread that joy to others as much as I can. At the launch of this blog in October 2021, my audience consists of only friends and family. As someone who inspires to be an educator, I hope to exapnd this blog to as many people as I possibly can in order to share my knowledge!
